equal_angles

Utility function to create clusters

equal_angles(phi, theta, gamma, N)

Arguments

phi
Euler angle
theta
Euler angle
gamma
Euler angle
N
number of particles

Value

3xN matrix

Details

Identical particles

See also

Other user_level cda utility: dye_coverage, equal_sizes, spheroid_ar
